[[File:Fig 4 BU temoin avec boitier.jpg|gauche|vignette|573x573px|'''Figure 4'''. Control urine dipstick.]]
[[File:Fig 5 BU hematuria.jpg|alt=- Figure 5. Urine dipstick demonstrating haematuria (3 crosses +++).|vignette|574x574px|'''Figure 5.'''' Urine dipstick demonstrating haematuria (3 crosses +++).|left]]

question.question: What is the typical appearance of a urine dipstick with haematuria?
question.option_a: A normal dipstick with no blood or staining
question.option_b: A dipstick with a few red specks or streaks of blood
question.option_c: A dipstick with a large amount of blood or staining
question.option_d: A dipstick with no blood or staining
